item.title: How to use ExpertFlyer to find the real reason your flight was delayed or canceled
item.description: Airlines often blame weather for delays. Here’s how to use ExpertFlyer to see the real reason your flight was delayed or canceled, and why it matters.

item.title: Deal alert: Points and miles travel deals for December 2025
item.description: Save, maximize and earn points and miles on various travel purchases this December.

item.title: Germany’s best Christmas markets — and how to get there on points and miles
item.description: Your guide to the best Christmas markets in Germany, and how to plan a trip with points and miles.

item.title: United escalates Chicago turf war against American with 2 new routes
item.description: Raise your hand if you had Erie, Pennsylvania, and Johnson City, Tennessee, at center of turf war between two of the United States’ biggest airlines.

item.title: New Hawaii route: Southwest gives the Big Island's Hilo its first mainland nonstop in 3 years
item.description: Southwest Airlines announced the first nonstop service to Hilo, Hawaii from the U.S. mainland in more than three years.
